RepairWise (https://repairwise.pro) - SF Bay Area, CA - Full-time

We’re a software-enabled startup on a mission to support the influx of thousands of off-warranty electric vehicles that need to be diagnosed and repaired, while delivering a trustworthy auto repair experience for EV owners.

The founding team has built and operated numerous well-known companies in the automotive & mobility space, and are now searching for exceptional engineers to help pursue this mission:

  1. Head of Data / AI - Onsite in SF Bay Area

  2. Senior Full-Stack Engineer - Remote USA

Please email your Resume / portfolio to hnhiring@repairwise.pro, and we’ll share more about the company and the role you’re interested in.
